text: he wrote back. cooper and hofstadter resorting to juvenile attempts at humour is proof they have nothing to back up their ridiculous paper. it should come as no surprise given they work at cal tech, essentially a technical school, where even the physicists are basically engineers. engineers? do you know how insulting that is?
